content: ** find our easy garter scarfy-wrap kits here 1 ** 1 https //knitomatic com/products/easy-gradient-garter-scarfy-wrap-kit **finished dimensions** - 13 deep - 22 5 wide at bottom - 66 wide at top > **if you love this design please help us by adding it to your ravelry favorites and sharing it on your favorite social media facebook instagram twitter pinterest etc thank you ** > > **10% off all yarn at knitomatic com use discount code rav17 at check out ** 1 > we reserve the right to cancel offer at any time **notes** this scarfy-wrap is a simple easy knit ideal for beginners skills include casting on knitting increasing casting off and weaving in ends **materials** approx 400m to 500m of dk weight yarn or at least 80m in each of 5 colours 4mm/us6 36 circular needles 8mm/us11 needles for bind off darning needle preferably pointy & small 1 https //knitomatic com/products/easy-gradient-garter-scarfy-wrap-kit
